item.title: Is Jonathan Taylor the RB of the future?
item.description: Former Wisconsin Running Back Jonathan Taylor was a monster in college. Averaging over 2,000 yards a season, Taylor was a large contributor to Wisconsin’s successful offense. The NFL was no different for Mr. Taylor. His Indianapolis Colt’s had a promising 11-5 season that I’m sure Jonathan played a major roll in. Let’s look at some statistics! library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.2 ✓ purrr 0.
